classLoader

Class JavaClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • classLoader.JavaClassLoader

  • public class JavaClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Class loader. Allows to dynamically load a class Code largely taken from: http://examples.javacodegeeks.com/core-java/dynamic-class-loading-example/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavaClassLoader() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String invokeRunMethod(java.lang.String classBinName, java.io.File file)
      This method invokes the dynamically loaded class' run() method
      boolean invokeVerificationMethod(java.lang.String classBinName, java.lang.String methodName)
      This method verifies that the loaded class has a valid name and run method

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.ClassLoader

        clearAssertionStatus, getParent, getResource, getResourceAsStream, getResources, getSystemClassLoader, getSystemResource, getSystemResourceAsStream, getSystemResources, loadClass, setClassAssertionStatus, setDefaultAssertionStatus, setPackageAssertionStatus

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JavaClassLoader

        public JavaClassLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • invokeRunMethod

        public java.lang.String invokeRunMethod(java.lang.String classBinName,
                               java.io.File file)
        This method invokes the dynamically loaded class' run() method
        Parameters:
        classBinName - the name of the dynamically loaded class
        file - the java file containing the loaded class
        Returns:
        the result string of the loaded class' run method. empty string in case of exception.

      • invokeVerificationMethod

        public boolean invokeVerificationMethod(java.lang.String classBinName,
                               java.lang.String methodName)
        This method verifies that the loaded class has a valid name and run method
        Parameters:
        classBinName - the name of the dynamically loaded class
        methodName - the name of the method to verify
        Returns:
        true indicates that the class was succesfully loaded and supports the given method name. false in case of exception.
